title: Body Therapies
text:
Body Therapies
Our body treatments have one goal in mind – to reset your normal body function. Many times due to lifestyle and eating habits our bodies retain toxicity that leaves us feeling sluggish and fatigued. These treatments are formulated towards eliminating toxicity and resetting your body. Our expert team is able to recommend a course of treatments that will help you reach your goals and help you feel brand new again.
Lymphatic Drainage - $105
Lymphatic Drainage is a form of therapy that stimulates the lymphatic system with gentle strokes. The light rhythmical therapy encourages the lymphatic system to eliminate metabolic waste products, excess fluid and bacteria. Promotes detoxification, facilitates healing and supports the immune system.
Professional Staff
Our staff is trained to provide the best service possible and one that exceeds expectations. Further than providing an amazing treatment their main goal is to educate the client. What sets them apart is that they are completely invested in client results and making sure to provide them with all the necessary tools and recommendations that they need in order to reach their goals. They are always ensuring to keep a clean and sterile environment at all times.
DETOX
These treatment will aid in your body’s natural detoxification processes. Their goal is to eliminate and help push any stagnant toxicity which is holding your body back from performing at its best capability.
IONIC FOOT DETOX – $45
This treatment produces millions of positive and negative ions which flow through the body and attach themselves to oppositely charged toxins and draw them out of the body through the soles of the feet.
INFARED SAUNA – $65
Do you want to detox like you completed a juice cleanse, burn calories as if you ran 3-4 miles, feel like you got a deep tissue massage, a facial and meditated ALL in 45 minutes? Our Infrared sauna will do just that.
LYMPHATIC DRAINAGE – $105
This treatment stimulates the lymphatic system with gentle strokes. The light rhythmical therapy encourages the lymphatic system to eliminate metabolic waste products, excess fluid and bacteria. Promotes detoxification, facilitates healing and supports the immune system.
EAR CANDLING – $105
Using cones made of fabric and essential oils, warm smoke enters the auditory canal to soften the compacted wax inside the eardrum. Ideal for nasal congestion and vertigo.
EXFOLIATION GLOW -$110
Energizing scrub leaves your entire body smooth and supple to the touch using a stimulating scrub to reveal radiant, younger looking skin.
Aromatic Hot Therapy – $115
Therapeutic essential oils are customized for your specific needs and applied to the body prior to wrapping it in a thermal spa blanket. The thermal blanket helps the oils penetrate deeper to promote faster results. Ideal for clients who suffer from congestion, inflammation and allergies.
RESTORE
These treatments are the perfect combination of treating yourself while benefiting your health at the same time. You will leave feeling relaxed and restored to your best self after you are done.
